adjourn.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if a meeting, parliament, law court etc adjourns, or if the person in charge adjourns it, it stops for a short time
adjourn.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: It was almost noon when the meeting adjourned.
Congress has adjourned for the November elections.
His trial was adjourned until May.
adjourn.translation[1].definitions[0].de: if a meeting or law court adjourns, or if the person in charge adjourns it, it finishes or stops, either for a short time, or until the next time it meets
adjourn.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The chairman has the power to adjourn the meeting at any time.
